name: Lights out (itch) (Jumanji144)
description:
You need to finish your homework before 1AM but suddenly you hear a buzzing, a fly, you turn off the lights, but they keep turning back on. "What is this?" you ask yourself, but then in the woods you see something, something attracted to the lights, coming ever so near. You want to go to bed to skip this all, but you need to finish your homework because otherwise you'll get arrested

Controls:

WASD - Movement,

-,+ - Decrease or Increase mouse sensitivity

E - Start or End homework session

G - Go to bed

Textures:

https://www.sketchuptextureclub.com/

Sounds:

Fonts:

Google Inc: Roboto, Jura
